title: Toolbox for hubverse Continuous Integration.
text: hubs hosted GitHub, use use_hub_github_action() download one hubverse GitHub Actions. Note: hub configured R project (.e. contain *.Rproj file)

title: Hubverse GitHub Action setup — use_hub_github_action
text: Sets common continuous integration (CI) workflows hub hosted GitHub using GitHub Actions. Available actions hosted repository Infectious-Disease-Modeling-Hubs/hubverse-actions function creates necessary directories downloads requested GitHub Action yaml file.

title: Hubverse GitHub Action setup — use_hub_github_action
text: name Name workflow, .e. name one action repository directories containing GitHub Action workflow .yaml file.
